description: Will Braun is a troubled youth living in the big apple, doing what he must to survive. That is of course, until he gets caught. After a little time in a correctional facility, Will is ordered to get a “Big Bro,” who just happens to be Dirk Caber. After Will finally starts to warm up to him, Dirk thinks there’s more he can teach him. Dirk provides a bit of coaching in the important skill of eating ass which Will picks up nicely. Once Will jams his big dick into his mentor’s cock hungry hole, it is clear that pounding ass would be a great asset that this young man can enjoy forever.
title: Big Bro Part 1
